items.content_html: Bring reactivity to your HTML with a minimal and lightweight library!
items.title: htmzjs/htmz: Bring reactivity to your HTML with a minimal and lightweight library!

items.content_html: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.
items.title: react18-tools/react-webgl-trails: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.

items.content_html: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.
items.title: noureddineouafy/silana-lite-ofc: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.

items.content_html: AnjuJS is a lightweight and efficient library for password encryption. It allows you to create custom encryption systems with salt, preferences, and a security key. It offers fast, secure encryption that is easy to implement, ideal for developers looking for a flexible and high-performance solution for managing passwords.
items.title: Shadouuh/Anju-JS: AnjuJS is a lightweight and efficient library for password encryption. It allows you to create custom encryption systems with salt, preferences, and a security key. It offers fast, secure encryption that is easy to implement, ideal for developers looking for a flexible and high-performance solution for managing passwords.

items.content_html: Peek is a lightweight screen-sharing application that is designed for users to seamlessly share their screen for collaborative efforts.
items.title: qiubrandon/peek: Peek is a lightweight screen-sharing application that is designed for users to seamlessly share their screen for collaborative efforts.

items.content_html: A modern, lightweight, fast, and powerful global state management library for modern React.js projects.
items.title: react18-tools/kosha: A modern, lightweight, fast, and powerful global state management library for modern React.js projects.

items.content_html: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.
items.title: react18-tools/nextjs-darkmode: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.

items.content_html: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.
items.title: react18-tools/react-markdown-autolink: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.

items.content_html: Klaim is a lightweight TypeScript library designed to manage APIs and record requests, optimized for an optimal user experience.
items.title: antharuu/klaim: Klaim is a lightweight TypeScript library designed to manage APIs and record requests, optimized for an optimal user experience.

items.content_html: Sym-Pick is a lightweight and efficient VS Code extension that makes inserting Unicode symbols effortless. It provides a searchable list of symbols and emojis that can be inserted into your code with a single click.
items.title: bwlange/sym-pick: Sym-Pick is a lightweight and efficient VS Code extension that makes inserting Unicode symbols effortless. It provides a searchable list of symbols and emojis that can be inserted into your code with a single click.

items.content_html: A lightweight and efficient autocomplete system with a PHP backend and React frontend. Provides real-time search suggestions and employee lookup functionality. Built with RESTful APIs, optimized query handling, and a responsive UI.
items.title: AdirElmaleh/autocomplete: A lightweight and efficient autocomplete system with a PHP backend and React frontend. Provides real-time search suggestions and employee lookup functionality. Built with RESTful APIs, optimized query handling, and a responsive UI.

items.content_html: ‚è∞ A lightweight repository hosting daily 60s news data, automatically updated via GitHub Actions.
items.title: vikiboss/60s-static-host: ‚è∞ A lightweight repository hosting daily 60s news data, automatically updated via GitHub Actions.

items.content_html: A lightweight fetching library packed with essential features - retries, interceptors, request deduplication and much more, all while still retaining a similar API surface with regular Fetch.
items.title: zayne-labs/call-api: A lightweight fetching library packed with essential features - retries, interceptors, request deduplication and much more, all while still retaining a similar API surface with regular Fetch.

items.content_html: Postier is a cross-platform HTTP client designed to be a lightweight and fast alternative to Postman or similar.
items.title: bouteillerAlan/postier: Postier is a cross-platform HTTP client designed to be a lightweight and fast alternative to Postman or similar.

items.content_html: The client library for Microstream, a lightweight, real-time communication library for microservices. Replace REST/gRPC with WebSockets for event-driven messaging. Simplifies inter-service communication with a request-response pattern and automatic reconnection. [ NPM üì¶ ]
items.title: arijitcodes/microstream-client: The client library for Microstream, a lightweight, real-time communication library for microservices. Replace REST/gRPC with WebSockets for event-driven messaging. Simplifies inter-service communication with a request-response pattern and automatic reconnection. [ NPM üì¶ ]

items.content_html: Streamix is a lightweight reactive programming library for JavaScript and TypeScript, offering RxJS-like functionality through generator-based streams for efficient async data processing.
items.title: actioncrew/streamix: Streamix is a lightweight reactive programming library for JavaScript and TypeScript, offering RxJS-like functionality through generator-based streams for efficient async data processing.

items.content_html: A lightweight, modular framework for building Node.js applications with a clean architecture
items.title: zest2citron/flow-server-framework: A lightweight, modular framework for building Node.js applications with a clean architecture

items.content_html: The central hub for Microstream, a lightweight, real-time communication system for microservices. Routes messages between services, handles service discovery, and ensures seamless communication with WebSockets. Perfect for building scalable, event-driven architectures.
items.title: arijitcodes/microstream-hub: The central hub for Microstream, a lightweight, real-time communication system for microservices. Routes messages between services, handles service discovery, and ensures seamless communication with WebSockets. Perfect for building scalable, event-driven architectures.

items.content_html: Fast, lightweight access to Apache Arrow data.
items.title: uwdata/flechette: Fast, lightweight access to Apache Arrow data.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js server that processes exam questions using AI capabilities Google Gemini model.
